1.0.name: wordpress/piccshare
1.0.description:
A picture is worth a thousand words and PiccShare is just all about sharing your web site pictures into the social media. The Piccshare button is an elegant overlay that will allow your visitors to easily share your visual content in the social sphere. The PiccShare button is the social SEO (Facebook, Twitter, email) tool to boost your traffic for free. Maximize your content and increase your revenue or in other words, earn more money and exposure with the same content you already have. Piccshare is a sharing button that will be rendered on top of each photo and will expose social share buttons to enable sharing the photo link to facebook, twitter and by email.

You can visit us at http://piccshare.com
